trends: There have been no other sightings in Joseph City
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details2 hemispheres seperated by a center ring I was driving in front of the power plant and went around a curve. Thier it was HUGE, about the size of the Super Dome. The cloud cover was at 23,00 ft that day and this was below the clouds.There where also strong winds that day, and I believe that there was a small aircraft adviery, due to the winds. It stayed in place, on a wobble. Whent into another curve while driving and looked back to see it again and it was gone. This object was shinny silver, like a mirror. It was also near a power plant, accros the road. It also had a wobble to it. All I can think is it was tapping free electrons from the power plant.
